summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, so no requirements can be considered missing. The diff introduces multiple new UI components and behaviors (e.g., Sent Downloads tab/list, sent/received filtering utilities, received-file toast notifications, and profile settings changes) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new Dashboard "Sent Downloads" tab that loads transfer history, filters sent transfers, and renders a sent downloads list with a loading state.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so this new UI feature was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a SentDownloadsList component with per-item download action, download-in-progress state tracking, and toast notifications for success/cancel/error.
Added/extended transfer-history filtering utilities, including filtering for sent transfers by current principal.
Added toast notifications for newly received files based on unseen transfer IDs in the Dashboard.
Modified Settings dialog to include a (disabled) Bio field and updated profile form behaviors/validation/toasts.
Backend Motoko canister code was modified (exact behavioral changes unclear due to truncation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements), and the diff summary does not tie this to any stated requirement.
